title: Into the Ranks of the Deceived
description: Jane Parker is destined for greatness. As the daughter of Henry Parker, Lord Morley, she was prepared for a life in King Henry VIII’s court from a very young age. The masques, banquets, rich clothes and being within the most powerful inner circle of the land soon all became part of Jane’s everyday life. With a possible love match with the handsome George, the son of the rising Boleyn family, this makes Jane’s life complete. However, Jane soon begins to realise that everything that glistens comes at a price. "Into the Ranks of the Deceived" is Part 1 of "The Lady Rochford Saga".
author: Danielle Marchant
